name: Turn-based TD Deckbuilder
description:
Hi all,

The "long anticipated" campaign mode and card drafting/deck building element has been added to the game! See changelog for more details.

I've added a player controlled "Hero" to the game. Not sure yet how I feel about the addition; try it out and let me know what you think. Is it worthwhile or should we just be playing cards?

--------

This is a turn-based, deck-building, "tower" defense game. If any of that sounds interesting to you, please give the game a try! For Windows only. Just download, unzip, and run "TDDeckbuilder.exe"

It's early days yet in development and there is much to do. There is NO custom art (if anyone knows a modeler/animator/artist that might be interested in teaming up, let me know!) or music/sound effects, I might look at purchasing some assets down the line.

Thanks for taking the time to try this out! Comments and ideas welcome!!
